titles.title: O happy day that fixed my choice

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O happy day that fixed my choice On Thee, my Savior and my God! Well may this glowing heart rejoice, And tell its raptures all abroad.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O happy bond, that seals my vows To Him who merits all my love! Let cheerful anthems fill His house, While to that sacred shrine I move.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}High heav’n that hears the solemn vow, That vow renewed shall daily hear! Till in life’s latest hour I bow, And bless, in death, a bond so dear.{/lang-eng}
